title: Multi-label Learning: Techniques for Handling New Class Labels in Dynamic Data Stream Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Machine Learning Concepts, Python Programming, Data Preprocessing Experience
context.additional_context: Content structuring optimized for smartphone learning environments, breaking down complex algorithm concepts into sequential instructional steps

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to design a basic framework for solving multi-label classification problems in data stream environments.
Apply a methodology for identifying dynamic class label groups using OPTICS clustering.
Build a system for handling multiple new labels by implementing an incremental classifier update technique.
Develop lightweight model evaluation metrics executable in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
